title: Gold 1 Support main LFT

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
I am a dedicated player willing to take criticism from other players and work together as a team to improve. I am looking for a serious team that would be willing to take me and work with me to improve as individual players as well as a team. I also want to have a team that would be willing to join tourneys. 

Application- 

Solo Q rank: Gold 1

Comms: Can download any program necessary.

Availability: Every week night 6:00 â€“ 10:00 and more on Saturday and Sundays (GMT +10)

Champ pool: Thresh/Leona/Annie/Morgana/Janna/Lulu/Blitz 
Willing to learn more champs and expand in my own champ pool. 

Thank you for reading, hope to hear from you. 
Chauvinistic 
{{summoner:4}}
